title: HTML5
description: With strong HTML skills, I have the ability to build well-structured, clean, and responsive web pages. I am proficient in semantic HTML5, ensuring that my code is accessible and optimized for SEO. I can efficiently use tags to structure content, create forms, embed media, and ensure cross-browser compatibility. My understanding of HTML also extends to collaborating effectively with CSS and JavaScript for dynamic, interactive websites.

title: CSS
description: I have a solid grasp of CSS, enabling me to create visually appealing and responsive web designs. I excel at using modern CSS techniques like Flexbox, Grid, and responsive media queries to build layouts that adapt to various screen sizes. My experience with CSS also includes animations, transitions, and styling forms or buttons to enhance user experience. Additionally, I am familiar with preprocessors like SASS and best practices for organizing stylesheets for maintainability and scalability in larger projects.

title: JAVASCRIPT
description: I have a strong command of JavaScript, allowing me to build dynamic, interactive web applications. I am skilled in manipulating the DOM, handling events, and creating responsive user interfaces. My expertise includes using modern ES6+ features like arrow functions, destructuring, and promises to write clean, efficient code. I have experience with asynchronous programming (using async/await), API integration, and working with libraries such as jQuery or frameworks like React. Additionally, I am well-versed in debugging, optimizing performance, and following best practices to ensure maintainable, scalable code.

title: TYPESCRIPT
description: I am proficient in TypeScript, which allows me to write strongly-typed, scalable, and maintainable code for complex applications. My skills include leveraging TypeScript’s static typing to reduce runtime errors, improving code reliability and readability. I am experienced in working with interfaces, enums, generics, and advanced types, ensuring that my code is both flexible and robust. Additionally, I have integrated TypeScript with modern frameworks like React and Node.js, utilizing type safety to streamline development and enhance collaboration within teams.

title: VUE.JS
description: I have strong expertise in Vue.js, a versatile framework that allows me to build efficient, reactive, and component-based user interfaces. I am proficient in working with Vue's core features, including directives, the reactive data model, and computed properties. My experience includes building reusable components, managing state with Vuex, and routing with Vue Router for seamless navigation. I am also familiar with Vue's single-file components (SFCs), making it easy to integrate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript within the same file. Additionally, I follow best practices to ensure modularity, maintainability, and performance optimization in Vue.js applications.

title: REACT.JS
description: I am highly skilled in React.js, enabling me to build dynamic, efficient, and scalable web applications. My expertise includes using React's component-based architecture, managing state with hooks like useState and useEffect, and optimizing performance through techniques like memoization and lazy loading. I am experienced in working with React Router for seamless navigation and integrating state management solutions like Redux or Context API for handling complex application states. Additionally, I follow best practices in JSX, props, and lifecycle management, ensuring my React applications are modular, maintainable, and responsive.

title: FLUTTER
description: I am proficient in Flutter, a powerful framework for building natively compiled, cross-platform applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. My skills include working with Flutter’s widget-based architecture to create dynamic, responsive, and highly performant UIs. I am experienced in managing state with solutions like Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc, and integrating APIs for real-time data handling. I am also familiar with customizing widgets, handling navigation using Flutter’s Navigator, and implementing animations to enhance user experiences. Additionally, I follow best practices for code organization, reusability, and performance optimization in Flutter development.

title: NODE-EXPRESS.JS
description: I have strong expertise in Node.js and Express.js, enabling me to build fast, scalable server-side applications. With Node.js, I leverage its non-blocking, event-driven architecture to handle multiple requests efficiently. My experience with Express.js includes creating RESTful APIs, managing middleware, and setting up routing to build robust web applications. I am skilled in integrating databases like MongoDB or SQL databases, handling authentication, and implementing error handling and logging. Additionally, I follow best practices for writing clean, modular code, optimizing performance, and ensuring security in my Node.js applications.

title: SPRING
description: I have a solid understanding of Spring Boot, which allows me to develop production-ready Java applications with ease. I am proficient in creating RESTful APIs, configuring microservices, and managing application dependencies using Spring Boot's convention-over-configuration approach. My skills include integrating with databases using Spring Data JPA, implementing security with Spring Security, and handling configuration and deployment through Spring Boot's built-in features. I am familiar with creating and consuming APIs, managing application properties, and optimizing performance. Additionally, I follow best practices for building scalable, maintainable applications and utilize tools like Docker for containerization and cloud platforms for deployment.

title: NestJs
description: I am proficient in NestJS, a progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, scalable, and maintainable server-side applications. My expertise includes working with NestJS's modular architecture to design RESTful APIs, manage controllers and services, and implement reusable, well-structured code. I am experienced in database integration using tools like TypeORM or Mongoose, and in implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms such as JWT or Passport. I have a solid grasp of event-driven architectures, leveraging message brokers like RabbitMQ or Redis for microservices. Additionally, I ensure high code quality by writing unit and integration tests, following SOLID principles, and optimizing application performance through caching and database tuning.

title: JAVA
description: I have strong expertise in Java, allowing me to build robust, scalable, and platform-independent applications. I am proficient in object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts such as inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation, which I apply to create modular and maintainable code. My experience includes working with Java's core libraries, multithreading, exception handling, and file I/O operations. I am also skilled in using frameworks like Spring and Hibernate for building enterprise-level applications, as well as working with Java's collection framework and design patterns to optimize performance and code structure. Additionally, I follow best practices to ensure clean, efficient, and scalable Java applications.

title: C++
description: I have a strong foundation in C++, enabling me to develop high-performance, efficient, and reliable applications. I am proficient in object-oriented programming (OOP) principles, including working with classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. My expertise also extends to advanced concepts like templates, operator overloading, and memory management using pointers, dynamic allocation, and RAII (Resource Acquisition Is Initialization). I am familiar with the Standard Template Library (STL) for efficient data structures and algorithms, and I follow best practices to write clean, optimized, and maintainable C++ code for both system-level and application development.

title: PYTHON
description: I am proficient in Python, a versatile language that allows me to build everything from simple scripts to complex applications. My expertise includes writing clean, readable, and efficient code using Python’s core libraries and third-party modules. I have experience with object-oriented programming (OOP), working with data structures like lists, dictionaries, and sets, and leveraging libraries such as NumPy and Pandas for data manipulation. I am skilled in using Python for web development (Django, Flask), automation, scripting, and API integration. Additionally, I follow best practices for writing maintainable, scalable Python applications, including testing, debugging, and performance optimization.
